name: Kenneth Daycare
description:
Run away from Kenneth. WASD to move, SHIFT to run.

There's a bug that you cannot input when you click out of the game when you loaded the game. Refresh the page and don't click anywhere when the game is loading.

Special thanks to:

  • Roman S
  • kilonalios
  • Garbaj (pathfinding tutorial)
  • Kevin Macleod (music track used)

for helping me finish this game.

I also used my GODOT FPS Template to speed up my development process, check it out in my itch.io page!

Special thanks to everyone who joined in the chat for the livestream as well <3

This was made LIVE in 3 hours for Trijam #152.

Thank you for playing.
